title: 157 Minecraft Facts You Possibly Didn't Know
author: Skip the Tutorial
description:
157 Minecraft Facts You Possibly Didn't Know! Minecraft has dozens of mobs, blocks, and items to choose from, so it can be easy to lose track of all the information. In that case, let's cover the best Minecraft facts of 2021 that you maybe missed. Today, Skip the Tutorial is joined by Block Facts to talk about some of the best Minecraft Mob facts, Minecraft Block facts, and Minecraft Item facts. If you enjoyed 47 Minecraft Mob Facts You Possibly Didn’t Know, this is the Minecraft list video for you! Enjoy this compilation of our best fact videos of 2021, plus new facts to learn as well!

Check out @Block Facts 

▪Want more? Subscribe Today! ▶https://goo.gl/ZDDJit
